detail_desc: Suede hobo bag with a magnetic fastener and leather handle. Two side pockets, decorative seams on the outside and three inner compartments, one with  zip. Size 25x15x30 cm.

Set with a T-shirt and joggers. T-shirt in soft, printed jersey. Joggers in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Linen dressing gown with two front pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Tumble-drying will help to keep the linen soft.
